reviews.review: The absolute amazing ending to a decade of adrenaline-filled characters, Avengers: Infinity War is what I, as a MCU aficionado, wanted to see. Falls short of some bits in story and screenplay because of the juggle between umpteen characters. Really gutted but left craving for Avengers 4 and more MCU films
Great movie with a great twist 5/5

lots of plot holes.. like doctor strange's 14 million possibility he saw, he didint see starlord snapping of about gamora and ruin the plan !!. and what was thor doing at the end of the movie leaving all the avengers facing thanos while he was trying to kill vision !! just showing up at the end of the fight tho the fight was not that far from him !! .. i think they were forcing the ending but they didnt make it convincing at all...
Stunned! You gotta be shittin' me! All those characters gone, plus Nick Fury? Puh-lease: Fake Movie!!!
once again, Marvel can do no wrong with the keystone to their Infiniti dollars at the box office gauntlet. can someone get the folks over at DC to watch a few of these?

Wow!!! This Movie is Fantastic. Its my favorite all time Movie So many outstanding performances. Such a great story line. A virtual express train of a movie- Going from emotional and action packed scene to Another. A new perspective to The Hero Genre. Everyday isnt victories and glory. Somedays, being a hero is a horrible combination of sacrifice, painful decisions, and failure. Captured Beautifully. So many great Performances, I hate to leave anyone out But Josh Brolin could not have done a better job. His “Thanos” was magnificent. He actually elicits some sympathy- hard to do for a megalomaniac!! I want to list the great performances-but to many to list. Suffice to say- you gotta see this movie I cannot wait to see this again. First time in a long time I wanted to go back to the theatre to see a movie again. I may go see this one 5-6 times. The people I saw it with all felt the same way. It is that good

As a casual fan on the MCU, I thought this was a great way to bring all of the franchise together. However, the sheer number of main characters was overwhelming, especially since I wasn't familiar with the GOG characters. Gammorah and Thanos knocked it out of the park with their layered characters that made you think as they struggled with their own sacrifices.
Absolutely phenomenal. Well worth the 10 year wait. The story was incredubly well written and the choreography for the fight sequences was spectacular.
